divs: Sighting DetailsI was staying at my sons house who lives in Monroe, NY. I did not sleep to well and was restless all night I woke up and looked at the clock it was 4:00 a.m. I got up out of bed and looked out the window and marveled at all the stars so clear in the sky (Living in the city I dont see that very much)thats when I noticed a cone shaped object, it was stationary and seemed to have a cloud around it and also a hint of lights which seemed obscured. It was the strangest thing I ever seen. I knew something was there but I couldnt quite make it out. Every time my eyes glanced away from it for a second and then came back to try an focus better was this hint of lights around the cone shape object. I must have watch for about 5 minutes or so and at no time did it move. I was getting a little nervous about what I was seeing I didnt want to watch anymore and tried to go back to sleep. All day long Ive wondered what it was that I saw.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Monroe
There were no other sightings in Monroe on or around September 20th 2009
